I love the snow.
I like to surf every chance i get.

content.text: Hi! I'm a big fan of Robert De Niro. What's your favorite movie of his?
My favorite movie of his is Taxi Driver. I love his character, Travis Bickle. He's so complex and interesting.
I agree, he's such a great actor. I love his work in Raging Bull too.
Yeah, that's another great movie. He really gives it his all in that one.
So, what do you do for fun?
I work graveyard in a hotel, so I don't have a lot of time for hobbies. But I like to surf every chance I get.
That sounds like fun! I've always wanted to try surfing, but I'm not sure if I'm coordinated enough.
It's not as hard as it looks. You just have to get the hang of it.
I'll have to try it sometime. Do you like the snow?
I love the snow! I grew up in a cold climate, so I'm used to it.
Me too! I love skiing and snowboarding.
Me too! I love spending the day on the slopes.
I'm glad we have so much in common. It's nice to meet you.
You too! It's nice to meet you too.
